annotation.spannedText: If you listen to the mainstream media, unvaccinated children are the archetypal lepers of the modern age, a societal scourge responsible for all disease and the only real obstacle to peace on earth

classMention.mentionClass: If you listen to the mainstream media, unvaccinated children are the archetypal lepers of the modern age, a societal scourge responsible for all disease and the only real obstacle to peace on earth

annotation.spannedText: vaccinated children are the real danger, at least when it comes to disease spread

classMention.mentionClass: vaccinated children are the real danger, at least when it comes to disease spread

annotation.spannedText: Contrary to popular belief, just because you've been jabbed doesn't mean that you're immortal

classMention.mentionClass: Contrary to popular belief, just because you've been jabbed doesn't mean that you're immortal

annotation.spannedText: live-virus vaccines like MMR (measles, mumps and rubella) actually shed for weeks, and sometimes months, following vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: live-virus vaccines like MMR (measles, mumps and rubella) actually shed for weeks, and sometimes months, following vaccination

annotation.spannedText: This means that children who were recently injected with MMR, oral polio vaccine and/or other live attenuated vaccines (LAV) are walking disease-carriers

classMention.mentionClass: This means that children who were recently injected with MMR, oral polio vaccine and/or other live attenuated vaccines (LAV) are walking disease-carriers

annotation.spannedText: this isn't some random conspiracy theory spread through one of those mythical Jenny McCarthy chain emails we keep hearing about -- it's a fact that's widely recognized, albeit quietly, throughout the greater medical community

classMention.mentionClass: this isn't some random conspiracy theory spread through one of those mythical Jenny McCarthy chain emails we keep hearing about -- it's a fact that's widely recognized, albeit quietly, throughout the greater medical community

annotation.spannedText: [a]void contact with children who are recently vaccinated

annotation.spannedText: official Patient Guide

classMention.mentionClass: official Patient Guide

annotation.spannedText: the recently vaccinated can, and often do, spread vaccine-derived viruses capable of killing children with weak immune systems

annotation.spannedText: Tell friends and family who are sick, or have recently had a live vaccine (such as chicken pox, measles, rubella, intranasal influenza, polio or smallpox) not to visit

classMention.mentionClass: the guide

annotation.spannedText: unvaccinated children are being erroneously blamed for putting vaccinated children at risk

annotation.spannedText: It's all a bunch of nonsense, of course, and those who haven't guzzled down the vaccine Kool-Aid can see right through all the hype

annotation.spannedText: the illnesses could just as easily have occurred due to contact with a recently vaccinated individual

annotation.spannedText: live-virus vaccines shed, potentially infecting both vaccinated and unvaccinated individuals

annotation.spannedText: A coordinated censorship attack is being waged against the entire independent media by Google, YouTube and Facebook

annotation.spannedText: Facebook is deliberately blocking the sharing of our stories to further censor our important reporting for human freedom and medical choice
